text: Interesting take there! But isn't history—with all its layers—a formidable element that cements a place as ‘home’? Even amid changes, some rooted aspects always strike me more deeply than any modern vibe ever can.
I end up scrutinizing every movie set design – occupational hazard when you're steeped in art!
Ever fund a ghostly art installation? Surprisingly costly!
Societal timelines often ignore individual life rhythms—unfairly so.
